name: Disney's Extremely Goofy Skateboarding
description: Get ready to catch "big air" and perform radical extreme skateboarding stunts like the pros. Board with Goofy or his son, Max in 4 worlds - beach, urban, desert, and suburban. Whether it's dropping into half pipes, speed skating, free skating, or performing 3D tricks, Disney's Extremely Goofy Skateboarding has gotcha covered!
